arts.ttl: Port Vale dismantle Bromley to move three points clear at top of League Two
arts.sum: Lorent Tolaj scored a brace and set up Jack Shorrockâ€™s opener, with further goals from George Byers and Ryan Croasdale helping Vale to victory.

Port Vale's 3-2 win over leaders Walsall last weekend was their fifth win in their last six games. They have now lost just two games in their last 13. Bromley's 4-0 win over Accrington last weekend w...
